Rare stuff, and some torrent history.



                            =========================



US-only "Bruce Springsteen With The Sessions Band PBS Exclusive" promotional EP; issued as a unique bonus item to donors supporting the "Public Broadcasting Service (PBS)" programming with a minimum "pledge" of $ 90. 
It is of particular note that four of the five live tracks on this CD (recorded during Bruce's three-show stand at The Point in Dublin, Ireland in November 2006, but left off the regular "Live In Dublin" multi-format release) are not officially available elsewhere. 



Bruce Springsteen (With The Sessions Band)

PBS Exclusive

2007


 
  CD / 2007 / 128Kbps



Tracklist:

1. Bobby Jean [18 Nov 2006]

2. The Ghost of Tom Joad [19 Nov 2006]

3. Johnny 99 [18 Nov 2006]

4. For You [19 Nov 2006]

5. My City of Ruins [17 Nov 2006]



Cover incuded
